sn51.8:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these four bases of psychic power.
sn51.8:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …
sn51.8:1.7: These are the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.8:1.8: It is because he has developed and cultivated these four bases of psychic power that the Realized One is called ‘the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha’.”
